casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Edwin BRITO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided March 1, 2017

Emily Wagner, assistant public defender, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 170 Conn. App. 269, 154 A.3d 535 (2017), is denied.
